Address.label: Address
Address.value: 220 RXR PLAZA, UNIONDALE, New York, 11556, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Flushing Financial Corp operates as a bank holding company, which is engaged in the provision of banking and financial services. The bank serves consumers, businesses, professionals, corporate clients, and public entities by offering a full complement of deposit, loan, equipment finance, and cash management services through its banking offices. Its principal business is attracting retail deposits from the general public and investing those deposits together with funds generated from ongoing operations and borrowings, primarily in originations and purchases of multi-family residential properties, commercial business loans, commercial real estate mortgage loans, construction loans, small business administration loans and other small business loans.
